page.title: 08LOCAL HISTORY. THE VILLAGE.
page.content: Since{1895}the small hamlet of{Burley {Woodhead} has changed in many ways. Over the past years the hamlet has grown into a small village with only one shop and one pub -{The Hermit.}In{ {1895} people used to live in{Burley {Woodhead}due to work but now as we creep into{1986}many retired people live in the village along with the commuters for {Leeds and Bradford.} They decided to live there because of the beautiful surroundings and countryside. This change has also come about with the closing of the four mills in{Burley woodhead}and the conversion of the mills and houses into lovely homes. The main grievence of the people living in the village is the speed with which the traffic travels through the village, exceeding the 40 mph. speed limit.
